text: Hagi havige vahe'mofo asenifina havi antahi'zamo avite'ne. Zamagra vahe'ma zamazeri havizama hunakura, havige eri'za kankamu retro hu'za havige kereti zamunte omne vahera rezmatga nehaze. Ana nehu'za nanekere'ma otiza zupa, zamunte omane vahe'mo'za tamage nehazanagi, zamagra havige hu'za keagafina zamazeri havia nehaze.
